otherNames: ブラックマジックＭ（マリオ）－６６
synopsis:
Based on the story Booby-Trap from Shirow Masamune's manga Black Magic.When two top secret military robots are lost in an accident, Sybel, a free-lance video journalist, becomes involved in a dangerous military fiasco.
One of the lethal M-66 units escapes with the mission to eliminate Ferris, the granddaughter of its creator. Time is running out as Sybel faces the deadly M-66 humanoid robot in an epic battle to save Ferris!
